name: Physics
about: Physics is the branch of science that deals with the structure of matter and how the fundamental constituents of the universe interact.

name: Chemistry
about: Chemistry is the study of substances—that is, elements and compounds—while biology is the study of living things.

name: Mathmatics
about: Mathematics is the science that deals with the logic of shape, quantity and arrangement. Math is all around us, in everything we do.

name: Biology
about: Biology is a branch of science that deals with living organisms and their vital processes. Biology encompasses diverse fields.

name: English
about: English is a study of literature, media and language in which students critically and creatively engage with a variety of texts.

name: Statistics
about: Statistics is the study and manipulation of data, including ways to gather, review, analyze, and draw conclusions from data.
